Title: Letter Spirit
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:16:30 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 2514 Last-modified: Wed, 27 Mar 1996 18:55:15 GMT Letter Spirit Letter Spirit An Emergent Model of the Perception and Creation of Alphabetic Style Description: The Letter Spirit project is an attempt to model central aspects of human high-level perception and creativity on a computer.
